name: Modern Minimalist Chair
description: A sleek and comfortable chair designed for modern living spaces. Features premium upholstery and solid wood legs.

name: Smart Workspace Desk
description: Ergonomic desk with built-in wireless charging and cable management. Perfect for your home office setup.

name: Premium Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Immersive sound quality with active noise cancellation. Long battery life and comfortable ear cushions.

name: Abstract Canvas Art
description: Hand-painted abstract art on high-quality canvas. Adds a touch of elegance and creativity to any room.

name: Automatic Coffee Maker
description: Brew the perfect cup of coffee every morning with this programmable coffee maker. Features a glass carafe and reuseable filter.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: High-performance mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting and tactile switches for the ultimate gaming experience.

name: Eames Lounge Chair
description: Premium quality Eames-style lounge chair made with genuine leather upholstery and solid wooden frame. Designed for maximum comfort and modern interior aesthetics.
